subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Lawrence Hill scored the tying and go-ahead baskets on his way to 22 points, and host Stanford rallied in the second half last night to defeat No. 3 U.C.L.A., 75-68, and hand the Bruins their second loss of the season.
snippet: Lawrence Hill scored the tying and go-ahead baskets on his way to 22 points, and host Stanford rallied in the second half last night to defeat No. 3 U.C.L.A., 75-68, and hand the Bruins their second loss of the season.
